issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
The different proporties buttons are cutoff at the bottom edge.

Not a Regression, occurs with 2.0.2GA

Steps to reproduce:

Iphone:
1.Build kitchen sink for mobile web in titanium studio.
2.Type the ip address of your laptop into the mobile device's web browser.(safari for iphone & IE for Windows Phone mango). 
3.Hit go or enter.
4.Kitchen sink will fire up in the browser.
5.Tap on phone tab.
6.Tap on the contacts table row.
7.Tap on the contact picker table row.
8.Notice that the buttons for animated,address only,stop on person,stop on proporties are cutoff at the bottom edge.

Windows Phone Mango:
1.Unable to scroll the page down thus cant unhide the contacts table row.Thus,further execution of the test case is blocked.

Actual result:
1.The buttons for animated,address only,stop on person,stop on proporties are cutoff at the bottom edge.

Expected result:
1.The buttons should not be cutoff at the bottom edge.
fields.summary: MobileWeb: Phone-->Contacts-->Contacts Picker:The different proporties buttons are cutoff at the bottom edge.
fields.environment:
Titanium Studio : 2.1.0.201206062004
SDK Version : 2.1.0.v20120607000247
Iphone 4.3.5
Windows Phone Mango

comments.body: Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
